ygData.subject: Re: LVL 10
ygData.msgSnippet: First off, trying to gate in melee is useless, you are counting on 2 misses in a row to cast that at lvl 10(casts faster as you lvl).  Try shadow step then
ygData.messageBody:
First off, trying to gate in melee is useless, you are counting on 2 misses
in a row to cast that at lvl 10(casts faster as you lvl). Try shadow step
then rooting, also I have never had a problem soloing. When I solo I root,
then blast. If I can get 2 blasts in while the root holds (almost 100% of
the time on blues) I can finish with melee and faster, lighter damage
spells. If they resist the first root then I Shadow Step and zone or gate
but if you do that, Macro a warning including what you are hunting

Nanil
Lvl 17 Wiz Veeshan

That's another annoying problem. I was running with a monk that
became
pk (I'll use pk and nonpk because it's less confusing to me) and the
cleric
in the party wouldn't help him at all. He even said, don't heal me,
don't
buff me or you'll become pk. Very cool of him.

As to the looting issue, that's absurd. (In your favor) NO ONE
should be
able to loot your body unless they personally killed you. Another
point for
you, and that's something that I think they need to address. I
didn't know
that just anyone could pick stuff off your body. As a matter of
fact, I'd
make looting a pk body that you didn't kill turn you pk. That'd be
more
reasonable I think. Believe me, no one's picking on you, maybe
taking the
easy way out, but not singling out pk players.

As to coding the changes. It's more than likely that it's easier to
make
them not be able to cast anything on you instead of being selective.
As a
matter of fact I KNOW it'd be easier that way. It's like having 1
switch to
turn on all the lights in your house, or running around and turning
some on
and some off.

All in all though, I think that for the moment, it'd be better to
just enjoy
the game as is for the moment, and work towards what changes you'd
like.
There's a fdback button there, use it and have all the pk players
you know
use it as well. Good to hear the comments though.

Zalbar
14th Wizard
Solusek Ro
